ChildCareTech.services

Class ContainedWindowService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChildCareTech.services.ContainedWindowService

  • public class ContainedWindowService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a window management service for the panes that will be loaded in other container windows.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContainedWindowService(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane)
      This constructor sets the pane passed as parameter as the container and call methods for loading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearInstance()
      Removes the controllers' instances from controller lists used for remote refresh purposes.
      NewAdultAnagraphicsController getAdultAnagraphicsController() 
      NewCanteenManagerController getCanteenManagerController() 
      NewKidAnagraphicsController getKidAnagraphicsController() 
      NewTripListController getTripListController() 
      NewWorkDayController getWorkDayController() 
      void loadAdultAnagraphics()
      Loads the adults anagraphic node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window.
      void loadCanteenManager()
      Loads the canteen manager node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window.
      void loadKidAnagraphics()
      Loads the kids anagraphic node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window.
      void loadTripList()
      Loads the trips list node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window.
      void loadWorkDayManager()
      Loads the workday manager node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window.
      static void refreshAdultTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all adults anagraphics windows except for the ones active in the foreground.
      static void refreshAllTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all controllers saved.
      static void refreshCanteenTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all canteen managers windows except for the ones active in the foreground.
      static void refreshKidTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all kids anagraphics windows except for the ones active in the foreground.
      static void refreshTripsTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all trips lists windows except for the ones active in the foreground.
      static void refreshWorkDayTables()
      Calls the refreshTable method for all workday managers windows except for the ones active in the foreground.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContainedWindowService

        public ContainedWindowService(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane)
        This constructor sets the pane passed as parameter as the container and call methods for loading.
        Parameters:
        anchorPane - the pane that will be used as container.

    • Method Detail

      • loadKidAnagraphics

        public void loadKidAnagraphics()
        Loads the kids anagraphic node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window. Refreshes the kids anagraphic table.

      • loadAdultAnagraphics

        public void loadAdultAnagraphics()
        Loads the adults anagraphic node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window. Refreshes the adults anagraphic table.

      • loadTripList

        public void loadTripList()
        Loads the trips list node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window. Refreshes the trips list table.

      • loadCanteenManager

        public void loadCanteenManager()
        Loads the canteen manager node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window. Refreshes the canteen manager table.

      • loadWorkDayManager

        public void loadWorkDayManager()
        Loads the workday manager node into the container node and sets its controller as the active window. Refreshes the workday manager table.

      • getKidAnagraphicsController

        public NewKidAnagraphicsController getKidAnagraphicsController()
        Returns:
        the controller for the kids anagraphic window

      • getWorkDayController

        public NewWorkDayController getWorkDayController()
        Returns:
        the controller for the workday manager window

      • clearInstance

        public void clearInstance()
        Removes the controllers' instances from controller lists used for remote refresh purposes. Should be called before deleting the instance of ContainedWindowService.

      • refreshAllTables

        public static void refreshAllTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all controllers saved.

      • refreshKidTables

        public static void refreshKidTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all kids anagraphics windows except for the ones active in the foreground.

      • refreshAdultTables

        public static void refreshAdultTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all adults anagraphics windows except for the ones active in the foreground.

      • refreshTripsTables

        public static void refreshTripsTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all trips lists windows except for the ones active in the foreground.

      • refreshCanteenTables

        public static void refreshCanteenTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all canteen managers windows except for the ones active in the foreground.

      • refreshWorkDayTables

        public static void refreshWorkDayTables()
        Calls the refreshTable method for all workday managers windows except for the ones active in the foreground.
